metadata.Plot: Barnstorming pilots Speed Condon, Bill Adams, and Eddie Smith travel the country with their manager, Alec Dugan, performing at fairs and air shows and hawking rides for the locals. But when Speed's rambunctious flying results in tragedy, he gives up flying in despair and guilt. Alec tracks him down and hopes to get him back on his feet and back in the air.
metadata.Writer: Joseph L. Mankiewicz, Agnes Brand Leahy, Grover Jones
metadata.Actors: Richard Arlen, Jack Oakie, Virginia Bruce
